titleStmt.title: The tryal of Roger Earl of Castlemaine for high treason in conspiring the death of the King, the subversion of the government, and introducing of popery and arbitrary power : before the Lord Chief Justice Scroggs &c. at the King's Bench Bar at Westminster the 23th of June 1680 where he was acquitted.
titleStmt.author: Castlemaine, Roger Palmer, Earl of, 1634-1705.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S.G. and N.E. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
